languages.text: Некто потревожил устоявшийся порядок книжных полок: среди томов о политике и военном искусстве теперь выделяется золоченная обложка рукописного труда о "Секретах галантного поведения".

Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."
languages.original_text: Некто потревожил устоявшийся порядок книжных полок: среди томов о политике и военном искусстве теперь выделяется золоченная обложка рукописного труда о "Секретах галантного поведения".

traits.locale_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "the secrets of gallant conduct."

Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

languages.text: 有人打乱了书架上书籍排列的顺序。在众多政治与军事著作中，你一眼就看到了《勇敢追求秘籍》这部手抄本无比显眼的镀金封面。
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

traits.locale_text: 有人打乱了书架上书籍排列的顺序。在众多政治与军事著作中，你一眼就看到了《勇敢追求秘籍》这部手抄本无比显眼的镀金封面。

languages.text: Jemand hat die etablierte Ordnung der Bücherregale durcheinandergebracht: Zwischen den Werken über Politik und Kriegskunst sticht nun der vergoldete Einband eines handgeschriebenen Buchs über "Die Geheimnisse des galanten Verhaltens" heraus.
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat die etablierte Ordnung der Bücherregale durcheinandergebracht: Zwischen den Werken über Politik und Kriegskunst sticht nun der vergoldete Einband eines handgeschriebenen Buchs über "Die Geheimnisse des galanten Verhaltens" heraus.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a touché aux livres bien rangés sur les étagères : parmi les œuvres sur la politique et l'art militaire, vous voyez désormais la couverture dorée très voyante d'un livre manuscrit sur « Les Secrets de la galanterie ».
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a touché aux livres bien rangés sur les étagères : parmi les œuvres sur la politique et l'art militaire, vous voyez désormais la couverture dorée très voyante d'un livre manuscrit sur « Les Secrets de la galanterie ».

languages.text: Alguien ha alterado el orden en que estaban distribuidas las estanterías: entre las obras sobre política y teoría militar se ve ahora la llamativa cubierta dorada de un libro manuscrito sobre «Los secretos de la conducta galante».
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha alterado el orden en que estaban distribuidas las estanterías: entre las obras sobre política y teoría militar se ve ahora la llamativa cubierta dorada de un libro manuscrito sobre «Los secretos de la conducta galante».

languages.text: 誰かが、秩序だっていた本棚の並びを乱した。政治や軍事技術の本の間に、金箔が使われた目立つ表紙の「礼儀正しい行為の秘訣」という手書きの本がある。
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."

traits.locale_text: 誰かが、秩序だっていた本棚の並びを乱した。政治や軍事技術の本の間に、金箔が使われた目立つ表紙の「礼儀正しい行為の秘訣」という手書きの本がある。

languages.text: Birisi kitaplığın düzenini bozmuş. Siyasi ve askerî eserlerin arasında "Cesaretin Sırları" adında, kapağı yaldızlı, el yazması bir kitap göze çarpıyor.
languages.original_text: Someone has disturbed the established order of the bookshelves: among the works on politics and military craft, you now see the conspicuous gilded cover of a handwritten book on "The Secrets of Gallant Conduct."
